# SVG Polish

* Having said all this, many times I've got stuck in stackoverflow hell going round in circles trying to get it to display 

```{r ggplot_save_as_svg}
a <- df_red %>% 
  ggplot2::ggplot() +
  ggplot2::aes(x = date,
               y = sales,
               colour = city) +
  ggplot2::geom_line() +
  ggplot2::scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  ggplot2::theme_minimal()

ggplot2::ggsave(file="test.svg", 
                device = "svg",
                plot=a, 
                width=10, 
                height=8)

```

* now that we have saved it lets insert it into PowerPoint and ungroup...
